name: Twinkies Dark Nightmares
description:
The most difficult puzzle game of your life, that will test your sanity and will to live!.

For centuries Twinkie has been sad about the way he looks and always wanted better teeth, he wished every night before bed that he would wake up with normal teeth but that never happened.

Until one night.. Twinkie woke up in a dream that he could not tell from a nightmare, its full of twinkies favourite foods but there seems to be no way out, will you help Twinkie to escape this nightmare and return to normal life?.

Featuring 10 mind boggling levels for you to complete each more difficult than the last. You will need to find all of Twinkies favourite food and then the exit to progress to the next level.
